GREECE
7 NIGHT/8 DAYS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”13px||39px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”30px|0px|33px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”16px|0px||0px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”15px” custom_margin=”0px||21px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ATHENS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-6px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|||5px|false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Arrival in Athens, you will be met and transferred to the hotel. In the evening you can choose to enjoy an optional Athens by a night tour. Overnight in Athens.
Note: Check in time at hotel is after 15:00 hrs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/emwsmlnossa-scaled.jpg” alt=”people walking on the street near the beach during daytime” title_text=”Photo by Courtney Mignot” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Package Image” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ max_height_tablet=”” max_height_phone=”” max_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”18px|auto||auto||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px||17px||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 02: ATHENS CITY TOUR

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Breakfast at the hotel.

The Athens city tour starts with a photo stop at Panathinaikos Stadium where the first Olympic Games took place in 1896. Then pass by the Temple of Olympian Zeus, and drive past Hadrian’s Arc, St. Paul’s Church, Parliament, Tomb of the Unknown Soldier, Schliemann’s House (Numismatic Museum), Catholic Cathedral, Old Parliament, Constitution Square, Russian Orthodox Church, and finally Acropolis. In the museum you can marvel at the many attractions such as votives, and statues from archaic period. In the afternoon enjoy a wonderful drive along the scenic coastal road which offers a splendid view of the Saronic Gulf. Pass through some of Athens most beautiful suburbs.

Arrive at Cape Sounion to visit the 5th century B.C Temple of Poseidon, here view some of the most breathtaking panoramic views in the world.

Overnight in Athens.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Athens3.jpg” alt=”people walking on the street near the beach during daytime” title_text=”Photo by Courtney Mignot” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Package Image” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ max_height_tablet=”” max_height_phone=”” max_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”100px||88px|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”2px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”40px|0px||0px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px||18px||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 03: ATHENS TO MYOKONOS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

This morning after Breakfast, transfer to Piraeus pier for your ferry to Mykonos. The rest of the day is yours to explore the most famous of the Cycladic Islands.

Overnight in Mykonos.

        

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/mykonos-2.jpg” alt=”people walking on the street near the beach during daytime” title_text=”Photo by Courtney Mignot” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Package Image” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ max_height_tablet=”” max_height_phone=”” max_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px||10px||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 04: MYOKONOS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

The day is at leisure as you enjoy all Mykonos has to offer, from beautiful sandy beaches to archaeological wonders to the extravagant nightlife!

Overnight in Mykonos.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 05: MYOKONOS TO SANTORNI

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-12px||||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

After breakfast, board a high-speed ferry for the stunning volcanic island of Santorini. Regarded by many as the most spectacular Greek island, Santorini boasts ancient rock formations, raw lava-layered cliffs, and beautiful black sand beaches. Cruise across the picturesque Caldera landscape of Santorini. Sail to the famous volcanic islands, the hot springs and the most unique beaches of the island. See the spectacular colors of the world-famous Santorini sunset.

Overnight in Santorini

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Santorini.jpg” alt=”people walking on the street near the beach during daytime” title_text=”Santorini” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Package Image” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ max_height_tablet=”” max_height_phone=”” max_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px||10px||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 06: VOLCANO AND HOT SPRING BOAT TOUR

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

In the morning after breakfast, you will be picked up from a designated pick up point and taken to Athinios port in order to take the traditional boat. The first stop is to the islet of Nea Kameni where you will have the opportunity to climb to the crater. Next the boat stops to Palaia Kameni for a short swim to the Hot Springs, which are considered to have healing powers. Afterwards head to Thirassia island, where you have 2 hours free to explore the island, swim or have lunch. Finally, the boat sails along the coast and ends up to the port of Athinios.

Overnight in Santorini

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px||11px||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 07: SANTORINI TO ATHENS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

After breakfast, this morning, transfer by ferry to Athens. Upon arrival, check into your hotel. The rest of the day is free.

Overnight in Athens.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px||10px||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 08: DEPARTURE FROM ATHENS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Today, you will be transferred to the airport for your flight back home.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ inner_shadow=”on” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”1px|0px|44px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”26px” header_font=”||||||||”]

GREECE
